fog.title: Ethereal fog
fog.description: Fog is a favorite subject of mine, it creates mood and separation. It helps to isolate subjects and adds depth to a scene with mystery and eeriness. Combined with light, opposing emotions can be elevated, harmony and wonder prevail.
